activities: Personal information is collected online and offline in connection with business activities of Pulse Secure and its affiliates, including information concerning prospective, current and former: customers; suppliers and vendors; partners and resellers and employees and agents. Pulse Secure and its affiliates use personal information received from the EU online, via means such as registration and order forms and in connection with products and services primarily for (1) customer service activities, such as processing orders, providing technical support and improving offerings; (2) sales and marketing activities as permissible under applicable law; (3) enabling and providing services, including services offered by means of the products described at the websites listed above; and (4) internal business processes and management, fraud detection and prevention, and compliance with governmental, legislative and regulatory bodies; and (5) educational and certification courses and instruction.  Pulse Secure also receives human resources data related to employment and benefits.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We collect first and lastname, email address, postal or physical adress.
